description: Test suite for CSVUrlKnowledgeBase integration with LanceDb, including synchronous and asynchronous tests involving agent queries and database operations.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Agent class responsible for handling knowledge base queries and interactions.

classes.name: CSVUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base class that loads CSV data from URLs into a vector database.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: Database class for interacting with LanceDB, supporting both sync and async operations.

methods.name: test_csv_url_knowledge_base
methods.description: Synchronous test function that verifies loading CSVs into LanceDb, querying via Agent, and cleanup.

methods.name: test_csv_url_knowledge_base_async
methods.description: Asynchronous test function that verifies async loading, querying, and cleanup of CSVs in LanceDb.
